name: Birds of a Feather
description:
You and a friend needs to get to know each other better, why not do it while taking a relaxing boat ride? In Birds of a Feather you can putter around a scenic lake and find ducks, just have a real chill time with a friend or by yourself it's fantastic trust me. 

If you get stuck on a wall just hit space!

Credits:

Producer/Programmer: Max Shiraishi

Lead Artist: Gina Griza

Lead Sound Designer: Chris Harrison Skinner

Lead Designer: Seiji Hamada
